casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 7, 2010

[Cite as 12/07/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-5951.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-0854. State v. Kirkland.

Hamilton C.P. No. B-0901629. This cause is pending before the court as a death penalty appeal from the Hamilton County Court of Common Pleas. Upon consideration of the joint motion to supplement the record,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted, and the trial court shall provide a copy of the remainder of the record in case No. B-0904028, which became First District Court of Appeals No. C-100277, within 20 days of the date of this entry.
